title: Padang Padang Beach Escape (Half-day)
overview: Relax at this scenic cove, swim, and enjoy the unique cliff access featured in 'Eat Pray Love'.

stops.description: Arrive and descend the stairs through the cliffs to the beach.
Enjoy a snack or drink at a local warung.

title: Padang Padang Surf & Chill (Full-day)
overview: A day of surfing, swimming, and relaxing at Padang Padang Beach.

stops.description: Surf or swim in the clear waters.
Lunch at a local warung with ocean views.
Take a walk along the cliffs for panoramic views.
